UN: World leaders respond to Trump and show their commitment to the climate struggle
subhead: At the end of the UN Climate Summit, over 100 countries, including China, either announced new CO2 emissions reduction targets or pledged to do so by COP30. A tour de force, as the world is riven by wars and trade conflicts.

title: Displaced residents in southern Lebanon fear return of large-scale war
subhead: Tens of thousands of Lebanese people are still displaced after two months of conflict in the autumn of 2024 between Israel and Hezbollah. Israel launched the offensive on September 23, 2024.

title: Nuclear fusion: The race among start-ups to harness limitless, clean energy
subhead: Who will be the first to feed fusion power into the grid? From Germany to China, the United States to France, more than 50 start-ups are locked in a fierce race to control this long-sought energy source.

title: Relationship sex: Why many women still feel pressure to say yes
subhead: Many women have sex with their partners even when they do not want to, out of reluctance to say no, uncertainty about desire, or fear of offending. Together, these reasons sketch the contours of a gray zone of consent.
